DESCRIPTION:
- You can look up a specific character by using the "scl" command. In this menu, you can check a character's statistics, their Version/3D/GIF variants, as well as their Gen/Fan leaderboards and their "Card ID".
- The "Card ID" is required when submitting images for new "Versions"
CHAR_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any character with the name: `{{arg}}`
CHAR_NF_SENSITIVE:
{{author}} Could not find any character with the name: `{{arg}}`

```fix
Note: Using the `-f` flag turns the function case sensitive!
```
NAME: Name:
NO_FANS_FOUND: This character does not have any fans yet!
MISSING_ITEMS: {{author}} You don't have enough `{{itemName}}` for this process
NO_OWNER_FOUND: There are no owners for this character's `Version` yet
NO_3D_OWNER_FOUND: There are no owners for this character's `3D` yet
NO_GIF_OWNER_FOUND: There are no owners for this character's `GIF` yet
